metadata.title: CVE-2017-0356 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw, similar to to CVE-2016-9646, exists in ikiwiki before 3.20170111, in the passwordauth plugin's use of CGI::FormBuilder, allowing an attacker to bypass authentication via repeated parameters.

criterions.comment: ikiwiki package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.20180228-1').
